      Toys Phone with 23 Cute Stickers, Dual Camera & Video Recording

      The phone for kids, has 13 funny games to choose from, allowing kids to enjoy entertainment while developing reflexes, hand-eye coordination, and logical thinking skills. Graffiti painting function can let children give full play to their imagination and creativity.

      Built in 10 interesting stories and MP3 music playback function, support 3.5mm headphone jack so that children can better enjoy music and relax. The included 8GB card can store more of your kids' favorite music.

      How are ratings calculated?
      To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness.
